subject: Request for Data Deletion under GDPR/CCPA
body:
Dear Support Team,

I hope this message finds you well. My name is John Doe, and I am writing to formally request the deletion of my personal data in accordance with the applicable privacy laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).

Please find my account details below for your reference:
- Full Name: John Doe
- Location: NY, USA
- Account Identifier (if applicable): [Insert Account ID or Email Associated with the Account]

According to your privacy policy, I have the right to request the deletion of my personal information from your records. Therefore, I kindly ask that you remove all personal data associated with my account, as well as any data processed for other purposes.

I would appreciate a confirmation of my request within 30 days as required by the CCPA and GDPR regulations.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
John Doe
